title: Episode 191: The Ohio State Reformatory
description:
This gothic structure has attracted filmmakers, history buffs, and paranormal investigators since it began hosting visitors decades ago. What started as a revolutionary state organization crumbled into decay before being saved by passionate citizens. But just as passionate are the former inmates who refuse to leave.

Recorded live at Funny Bone in Columbus, Ohio

Click here for info on our tour and to purchase tickets
